definition[0]: a woman at a party, meal etc who has invited all the guests and provides them with food, drink etc
definition[1]: a woman who introduces and talks to the guests on a television or radio show
definition[2]: a woman who shows people to seats in a restaurant in the US
definition[3]: a woman whose job is to entertain men at a nightclub
definition[4]: a type of sweet baked food, including Twinkies, chocolate cup cakes (=small cakes for one person), and small fruit pies
